name: Bounce Arena
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #21. Theme: Bounce

Content: In the year 2102, a revival of arena fights is taking place. Only it is no longer humans fighting against each other, but humans against machines. In the so-called bounce arena, the protagonist faces a deadly ball while trying to collect as much points as possible.

Controls:
Movement: WASD, Arrows, Controller Pad
Dodge: Space, L2/R2
Pause: P, Controller-Start

Idea, programming and graphics: dunkelgrau
Music: Conspirator by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
Leaderboard: Dino0040 (https://exploitavoid.com/leaderboards/v1)
